attributes.action: Send all available Royal Navy assets (including Vanguard class Trident submarines) to the Persian Gulf, into Iranian waters and demand that all British hostages be released immediately with the explicit threat of force if this demand is not met.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The taking hostage of fifteen British servicemen is a blatant act of war against the United Kingdom. We, the public demand that our government take military action immediately, to show the terrorist regime in Iran this type of aggression against Britain will no longer be tolerated.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
